Summary: Orange light followed by large jet at night.

divs: sighting detailsthe time was approximately 18:15 to 18:30 with a clear sky and no moon yet, sometime during january of 2008. i was leaving home and happened to look up to see if any jets were flying overhead (i feel i need to explain this habit. i love to fly in small aircraft, and came close to getting my license before a medical condition made it virtually impossible to do so. so most anything about flying even down to watching planes fly over has become a hobby) and noticed a jet flying overhead to the southwest. what caught my attention was the sound of the engines, louder than usual and leading me to think it might be a large passenger\cargo jet or maybe a military jet of some type. these planes just have a different sound to them than the smaller passenger jets that use the evansville airport, but its hard to explain. i got sight of the jet, and noticed a smaller orange ball of light in front of the jet, and it appeared the jet was following this orange light. i watched for maybe a couple of minutes, looked away for a second, and looked back. the orange light was gone, and the jet was making a turn to the right as if it were breaking off pursuit. the really odd things were i only heard noise from the jet, and when the jet made its turn, it made about a 270 degree turn and left the area in a southeasterly direction as if it was searching for something. recall that i said it initially was heading southwesterly. now why couldnt that pilot have just made a 90 degree turn and gone directly to the southeast instead of making almost a full circle before going the desired direction. this jet was low, enough for the engines to sound louder than normal, and i could tell it was low by the look of the strobe and clearance lights on the plane. i noticed that there were no strobe or clearance lights flashing on the orange ball. while watching this event i had no thoughts at all about what i might be seeing, but shortly after this incident i realized i had probably just seen my first ufo. i am thinking that the jet was probably some sort of military craft because passenger\cargo jets flying over the city are usually quite a bit higher and also they are keeping to a straight line course and not making a turn like i described. its hard to explain, but i just had that feeling about the jet. the reason i looked away for a second is that my neighbor had opened his door and walked out on his porch and i looked to see if he was looking my way, but he wasnt. the jet and orange ball were both going at a speed that when i turned back to look at them again, they both should have still been in sight, but the orange ball was gone and the jet was making its circular turn.
